snippet.title: 41 Days - Minimalist Pandemic Simulator
snippet.description:
PLAY 41 DAYS ON ANDROID: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.gamehugger.fortyonedays

PLAY ON DESKTOP BROWSER: https://gamehugger.itch.io/41-days-minimalist-pandemic-simulator

41 Days is a minimalist pandemic simulation game. Players are challenged to draw quarantine lines to stop the contagious virus outbreak. This game is hard, but so is managing a real pandemic. When the virus is out of control, it's time to draw the line!

Music: "Wanderlust" by Synth Kid
https://synthkid.bandcamp.com/track/wanderlust

Under Creative Commons 3.0 license:
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
